name: search
title: Search Component
description: Used in docs to list and search components.

options.name: show-search
options.description: Show search box only if number of components is more than number specified.

options.name: list
options.description: List of components with title and name attributes.

options.name: current-view
options.description: Sets active state on the matching component. Expected value is a name of the component as string, i.e. `component-a`.
